title: The Gene
description: 17-year old Pax Leighton has a problem, and it has everything to do with being lesbian. First are the mysterious men who came to her school and rounded her class. Second? Well, second is the cure. A cure that hasn't been approved. A cure that is now being forcibly injected in Pax's neck.But before it was injected successfully, three of Pax's schoolmate's arrives, rescuing her, and fleeing with her out of the campus. Now Pax is on the run. And along the way, she discovers that the whole country is being forced the same cure for being gay, the government in the middle of it all.
author: Yuriko Hime
